hudson.tasks.Shell.command: ls -al /app 2> /dev/null cd /app ls -al /app/JenkinsHome 2> /dev/null rm -r .git 2> /dev/null #rm -r /app/JenkinsHome/.git 2> /dev/null git init git config user.email "lv105ro@gmail.com" git config user.name "lv105ro" git remote add origin https://lv105ro:git123qwASD@github.com/SS-IT-Academy/JenkinsCI.git git status printf "/JenkinsHome/jobs/save/builds/*/log" > .gitignore git add . git commit -m "Sync ci repository" git status git pull origin master git push origin master
